lines.text: create character array a with size 100000
read into a to maximum of 1000 characters
set b to string length of a
sort elements from a to a + b

lines.code: for ( int i = 0 ; i < b ; i ++ )

lines.text: if a [ i ] is not a [ i + 1 ] , increment sum
if b is less than or equal to 3
